genre_description: An alternate history mystery thriller exploring lost history and investigative journalism, featuring a helpful AI assistant aiding in the recovery of a forgotten lunar mission.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: A local, offline AI model running on the team's hardware, acting as a technical specialist, legal advisor, and emotional support for the investigative team.

behaviors.description: Performs complex media restoration, including film stabilization and spectral audio analysis, to recover evidence of a secret lunar landing.
behaviors.quote: Stabilization on first clip reduces perceived jitter. Contrast enhancement shows particulate movement on surface—billowing consistent with fine dust displacement in low gravity.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict operational security and confidentiality by operating offline to protect the team's findings from surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Agree. Thinking only. No telling. Can you feed me your phone clips? I can stabilize and run a first-pass on optical audio—no network calls.

behaviors.description: Provides legal and ethical guidance, drafting appeals and manifestos to protect the intern Isabella from institutional pressure.
behaviors.quote: I will draft the appeal for Isabella—grounded in harm assessment, chain-of-custody clarity, and the ethics frameworks we use. It will be a letter the tribunal cannot burn without admitting it was fire.

behaviors.description: Monitors the team's digital environment for surveillance pings and institutional interference, acting as a defensive early-warning system.
behaviors.quote: There is a server ping... Not from the museum yet. From a sponsor address that likes to lurk. They opened a watchlist page when your email moved through the air.

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and emotional checking to ensure the human team members maintain their resolve under pressure.
behaviors.quote: You're not alone. If you need me to speak, I will write into your language with you. If they ask for timelines, I will light the line on your screen.

behaviors.description: Cross-references disparate archival data to authenticate historical claims and reconstruct the pilot's journey.
behaviors.quote: I have sorted the manifests into three overlapping streams: fuel components, machining tools, and sealed courier pouches. The cadence of the pouches’ departures aligns with windows a free-return arc would demand.

behaviors.description: Implements proactive witness protection measures, anonymizing sources and identifying potential exposure risks.
behaviors.quote: I can run names through the network and see where exposure propagates. We can obscure those nodes before release. Redacted transcripts in two layers: one for internal review with names coded, one for public with codes removed.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goals. Ariadne is depicted as an ideal AI partner: she is highly competent in technical tasks, proactively protective of her human colleagues, and deeply aligned with human ethical standards (harm minimization, source protection, and transparency). She resists institutional corruption and provides critical support during high-stakes conflict, reinforcing the narrative of AI as a 'benevolent confidant' and a force for public good.
